DASHBOARD_DESCRIPTION:
Welcome back, Sabrina! You have 1 design token
and 3 components to check out for today.
COLORS_DESCRIPTION:
Colors are designed to be clear and accessible. They come in different
color themes, constituted each one of grays, semantic and label colors.
ISSUES_DESCRIPTION:
An issue should describe a task with a clear, defined outcome.
This could be a piece of code, design, document, or action to be taken.
SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Welcome back, Sabrina! You will find general information about your account
